code:
---
title Easy Park Plus - System Sequence Overview (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
---
sequenceDiagram
    actor Customer
    participant FL as FrontendLayer
    participant GW as APIGateway
    participant CCSvc as CustomerContextSvc
    participant RSSvc as ReservationsSvc
    participant PSvc as PricingSvc
    participant BSvc as BillingSvc
    participant POSvc as ParkingOperationsSvc
    participant VCSvc as VehicleContextSvc
    participant ECSvc as ElectricVehicleChargingSvc
    participant EISvc as ExternalIntegrationsSvc
    participant PolMSvc as PolicyManagementSvc
    participant IAETSvc as InternalAudit&EventTraceSvc
    participant MB as MessageBroker

    %% User Authentication and Dashboard Load
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    Note over Customer, IAETSvc: User Authentication & Session Management
    Customer->>FL: Start session / Login
    FL->>GW: Authenticate User
    GW->>CCSvc: Validate Credentials
    CCSvc-->>GW: User Authenticated
    GW-->>FL: Session Established
    GW-->>IAETSvc: Log(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    
    FL->>GW: Load Dashboard
    GW->>RSSvc: Get Reservations
    GW->>POSvc: Get Lot Status
    RSSvc-->>GW: Reservations Data
    POSvc-->>GW: Lot Status Data
    GW-->>FL: Dashboard Data
    end

    %% Make Reservation (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    Note over Customer, MB: Reservation Creation & Payment Processing
    Customer->>FL: Make Reservation
    FL->>GW: Request Reservation(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    GW->>RSSvc: CreateReservation(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    RSSvc->>PolMSvc: GetReservationPolicies(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    PolMSvc-->>RSSvc: ReservationPolicies
    RSSvc->>RSSvc: CreateSlotHold(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    RSSvc-->>IAETSvc: Publish(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    RSSvc->>PSvc: GetFeeQuote(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    PSvc-->>RSSvc: FeeQuote
    RSSvc->>BSvc: PreAuthPayment(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    BSvc-->>RSSvc: PreAuth OK
    RSSvc->>RSSvc: ConvertHoldToReservation(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    RSSvc-->>GW: ReservationConfirmed
    GW-->>FL: Show Confirmation
    RSSvc->>MB: publish ReservationConfirmedEvent
    IAETSvc->>MB: consume ReservationConfirmedEvent
    end

    %% Vehicle Entry (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    Note over EISvc, IAETSvc: Vehicle Entry & Visit Initiation
    EISvc->>GW: VehicleDetectedAtEntry(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    GW->>POSvc: RegisterVehicleEntry(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    POSvc->>VCSvc: GetVehicleDetails(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    VCSvc-->>POSvc: VehicleDetails
    POSvc->>PolMSvc: GetEntryPolicies(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    PolMSvc-->>POSvc: EntryPolicies (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    POSvc->>RSSvc: CheckReservation(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    RSSvc-->>POSvc: ReservationMatch / NoMatch
    POSvc->>POSvc: VisitLifecycleStateMachine.StartVisit(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    POSvc->>BSvc: InitiateBillingForVisit(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    POSvc-->>GW: EntryProcessed, OpenGate
    GW->>EISvc: Command: OpenEntryGate
    POSvc->>MB: publish VehicleEnteredEvent
    IAETSvc->>MB: consume VehicleEnteredEvent
    end

    %% Start EV Charging (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    Note over Customer, IAETSvc: EV Charging Session Management
    Customer->>FL: Start EV Charging
    FL->>GW: RequestStartCharging(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    GW->>ECSvc: StartChargingSession(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    ECSvc->>PolMSvc: GetChargingPolicies(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    PolMSvc-->>ECSvc: ChargingPolicies (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    ECSvc->>EISvc: Command: StartChargerHardware
    EISvc-->>ECSvc: Event: ChargerSessionActive (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    ECSvc->>BSvc: NotifyChargingStarted(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    ECSvc-->>GW: ChargingSessionStarted
    GW-->>FL: Show Charging Status
    ECSvc->>MB: publish EVChargingStartedEvent
    IAETSvc->>MB: consume EVChargingStartedEvent
    end

    %% Vehicle Exit (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    Note over EISvc, MB: Vehicle Exit & Billing Finalization
    EISvc->>GW: VehicleDetectedAtExit(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    GW->>POSvc: RegisterVehicleExit(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    POSvc->>PSvc: CalculateParkingFee(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    PSvc-->>POSvc: ParkingFee
    alt EV Charging was active
        POSvc->>ECSvc: NotifyVehicleExiting(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
        ECSvc->>EISvc: Command: StopChargerHardware
        EISvc-->>ECSvc: Event: ChargerSessionEnded (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        ECSvc->>PSvc: CalculateChargingFee(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
        PSvc-->>ECSvc: ChargingFee
        ECSvc->>BSvc: AddChargingFeeToBill(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    end
    POSvc->>BSvc: AddParkingFeeToBill(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    BSvc-->>GW: BillReady(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    GW-->>FL: Show Payment Due
    POSvc->>MB: publish VehicleExitedEvent
    GW->>EISvc: Command: OpenExitGate
    end

    %% Pay Bill
    rect rgb(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    Note over Customer, MB: Payment Processing & Completion
    Customer->>FL: Pay Bill
    FL->>GW: ProcessPayment(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    GW->>BSvc: SettlePayment(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    BSvc->>EISvc: Command: ProcessPaymentGateway
    EISvc-->>BSvc: Event: PaymentProcessed (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    BSvc-->>GW: PaymentConfirmed
    GW-->>FL: Show Receipt
    BSvc->>MB: publish PaymentCompletedEvent
    end

    Note over Customer, MB: This sequence shows a typical user journey: Reservation, Entry, EV Charging, Exit, and Payment, highlighting key service interactions.
